title: Condensing into One Equation
text: We can multiply the second equation by $$5$$ and the first equation by $$2$$ and add to get $$31x=62$$

title: Substituting for the Other Variable
text: Plugging $$x=2$$ into the second equation, we get that $$5\left(2\right)+2y=16$$, which means that $$y=3$$
